Tonbo, along with http://anidb.net/ch17691 [Hijiri Shimon] and http://anidb.net/ch17692 [Mozuku], facilitated in http://anidb.net/ch10962 [Yamanaka Inoichi]`s Mind Reading of http://anidb.net/ch17695 [Yuudachi]. He complimented the speed at which Inoichi could read his memories, although Mozuku harshly scolded him for not concentrating on probing Yuudachi. When the invasion of Pain starts, they help distract the Animal Path to give Inoichi a chance to analyze what he has learned.

character.name: Hijiri Shimon
character.description: Hijiri Shimon is a Chuunin from Konohagakure. He is a proctor for the written portion of the Chuunin Exams. In Part II, He, Mozuku, and Tobitake Tonbo assist Yamanaka Inoichi in reading the mind of Yuudachi. When the invasion of Pain starts, they help distract the Animal Path to give Inoichi a chance to analyse what he has learned.

character.name: Mozuku
character.description: Mozuku is a Chuunin from http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure]. He acts as one of the proctors during the written portion of the Chuunin Exams, watching out for signs of cheating. He later fetches http://anidb.net/ch10929 [Mitarashi Anko] when Team Shiore is found dead. In the anime, he, Anko and Iwashi are seen on a mission shortly before Anko senses http://anidb.net/ch8603 [Orochimaru]`s death. Mozuku, along with http://anidb.net/ch17690 [Tobitake Tonbo] and http://anidb.net/ch17691 [Hijiri Shimon], facilitate in http://anidb.net/ch10962 [Yamanaka Inoichi]`s Mind Reading of http://anidb.net/ch17695 [Yuudachi]. When the invasion of Pain starts, they help distract the http://anidb.net/ch17693 [Animal Path] to give Inoichi a chance to analyse what he has learned.

character.name: Tazuna
character.description: Tazuna is a master bridge-builder, the father of Tsunami, and the grandfather of Inari.

character.name: Inari
character.description: Inari is the son of Tsunami, the grandson of Tazuna, and was the adopted son of Kaiza before his death.

character.name: Hyuuga Hiashi
character.description: Hyuuga Hiashi is the head of the Hyuuga clan. He is also the father of Hyuuga Hinata and Hyuuga Hanabi, as well as the older twin brother of the late Hyuuga Hizashi, and the paternal uncle of Hyuuga Neji.

character.name: Aburame Shino
character.description: Aburame Shino is one of the main supporting characters of the series. He is a chuunin-level shinobi of Konohagakure`s Aburame clan and a member of Team Kurenai.

character.name: Hyuuga Neji
character.description: Hyuuga Neji is one of the main supporting characters of the series. He is a jounin-level shinobi of Konohagakure`s Hyuuga clan and a member of Team Guy.

character.name: Inuzuka Kiba
character.description: Inuzuka Kiba is one of the main supporting characters of the series. He is a chuunin-level shinobi of Konohagakure`s Inuzuka clan. He and his partner, Akamaru are both members of Team Kurenai.

character.name: Akamaru
character.description: Akamaru is a nin-dog from Konohagakure`s Inuzuka clan. He is the partner of Kiba Inuzuka, as well as his best friend and companion.

character.name: Kankurou
character.description: Kankuro is a supporting character in the series. He is a jounin-level shinobi of Sunagakure and one of the three Sand Siblings.

character.name: Rock Lee
character.description: Rock Lee is one of the main supporting characters of the series. He is a chuunin-level shinobi of Konohagakure and a member of Team Guy.

character.name: Tenten
character.description: Tenten is one of the main supporting characters of the series. She is a chuunin-level kunoichi of Konohagakure and member of Team Guy.

character.name: Mizuki
character.description: Mizuki is a shinobi of Konohagakure and a former fellow Ninja Academy instructor alongside Iruka Umino. He later becomes the first antagonist of the series.

character.name: Bekkou
character.description: Bekkou is one of the many ninja who gather at the start of the series to track down Naruto when he steals the Scroll of Seals.

character.name: Yajirobee
character.description: Yajirobee is one of the many ninja who gather at the start of the series to track down Naruto when he steals the Scroll of Seals.

character.name: Ibara
character.description: Ibara was the mother of one of the students in Naruto`s class at the Ninja Academy. She was glad to see that Naruto, the jinchuuriki of the Nine-Tailed Demon Fox, did not graduate with the rest of his class.

character.name: Tsubaki
character.description: Tsubaki was the mother of one of the students in Naruto`s class at the Ninja Academy. She was glad to see that Naruto, the jinchuuriki of the Nine-Tailed Demon Fox, did not graduate with the rest of his class.

character.name: Genzou
character.description: Genzou is a photographer that takes pictures of newly graduated Academy students for use in their ninja profile. He has misgivings about Naruto`s use of war paint in his picture.

character.name: Tobio
character.description: Tobio was in the same graduating class as the members of Team 7. He accidentally knocked into Naruto, causing him to kiss Sasuke.

character.name: Madam Shijimi
character.description: Madam Shijimi is the wife of the daimyou of the Land of Fire. Team Kakashi in Part I and Team Ebisu in Part II are assigned to find her lost cat, Tora, soon after becoming genin. She loves her cat a lot, but the cat clearly does not share the same degree of affection to her.

character.name: Gatou
character.description: Gatou was a shipping magnate and founder of Gatou Company, who attempted to take control of the Land of Waves.

character.name: Enma
character.description: Enma was the personal summon of Sarutobi Hiruzen.

character.name: Yoshino Kaede
character.description: Kaede was http://anidb.net/ch10931 [Konohamaru]`s classmate until her family had to move to another village.

character.name: Fuuma Sasame
character.description: is a young kunoichi of the Fūma clan.

character.name: Kamizuru Suzumebachi
character.description: was an Iwagakure kunoichi and the leader of the Kamizuru Clan.

character.name: Kamizuru Jibachi
character.description: was a shinobi from the Kamizuru Clan and the youngest grandson of the First Tsuchikage, the founder of Iwagakure.

character.name: Kamizuru Kurobachi
character.description: was a shinobi from Iwagakure`s Kamizuru clan.

character.name: Tsubaki
character.description: is a kunoichi from Konohagakure, the fiancée of Mizuki.

character.name: Toki
character.description: is the daughter of the late daimyō Ōwashi, younger twin sister of Sagi, and the ruler of the Land of Birds.

character.name: Momiji
character.description: is a young girl from the Land of Vegetables.

character.name: Ruiga
character.description: was the younger brother of Jiga and Renga and the member of the Janin.

character.name: Haruna-hime
character.description: is the daimyō of the Land of Vegetables, who replaced her father after he was assassinated.

character.name: Jiga
character.description: was the second oldest brother from the Janin trio.

character.name: Renga
character.description: is the oldest brother of Jiga and Ruiga and the leader of the Janin.

character.name: Kikunojou
character.description: was a skilled ninja from the Land of Vegetables.

character.name: Yurinojou
character.description: is a ninja from the Land of Vegetables.

character.name: Mizura
character.description: is a genin from Hoshigakure.

character.name: Akahoshi
character.description: is a shinobi from Hoshigakure in the Land of Bears, and the self-proclaimed Fourth Hoshikage (四代目星影, Yondaime Hoshikage, Literally meaning: Fourth Star Shadow).

character.name: Shisou
character.description: is a Hoshigakure shinobi who worked under Akahoshi.

character.name: Yotaka
character.description: is a Hoshigakure shinobi who worked under Akahoshi.

character.name: Natsuhi
character.description: was a jōnin of Hoshigakure. Both she and her husband had completed the star training.

character.name: Hotarubi
character.description: was a jōnin from Hoshigakure.

character.name: Seimei
character.description: was the founder of Takumi Village, known for creating weapons for other shinobi villages.

character.name: Houki
character.description: was a ninja from the Takumi Village and the leader of the Four Celestial Symbols Men.

character.name: Kujaku
character.description: was the only female member of the Four Celestial Symbols Men.

character.name: Suiko
character.description: was a ninja from the Takumi Village.

character.name: Ryuugan
character.description: was a ninja from Takumi Village.

character.name: Jouseki
character.description: is a Senior from Sunagakure.

character.name: Katou Dan
character.description: was a renowned jōnin from Konohagakure.

character.name: Nawaki
character.description: was a genin from Konohagakure`s Senju clan.

character.name: Inuzuka Tsume
character.description: is a tokubetsu jōnin of Konohagakure, and a member of the Inuzuka clan. Her canine companion is Kuromaru.

character.name: Kuromaru
character.description: is a ninken from Konohagakure`s Inuzuka clan and Tsume Inuzuka`s partner.

episode.title: 失格? カカシの結論
